description: Usage statistics for types, categories, and items to support smart defaults and ordering in EditEntry screen

variants.happy: Realistic usage counts - Activity most common (100), Eating most common category (80), Omelette most common item (50)
variants.empty: No usage data - all counts zero, simulates first-time user

schema.typeStats: Array<{id: string, name: string, usageCount: number}>
schema.categoryStats: Record<typeId, Array<{id: string, name: string, usageCount: number}>>
schema.itemStats: Record<categoryId, Array<{id: string, name: string, usageCount: number, isBundle: boolean}>>
